name: AI Trip Planner
desc: A dynamic web application using React for seamless trip planning, integrating various APIs like Place API and Gemini API.

name: EnableEdu
desc: A comprehensive Learning Management System (LMS) designed for differently abled students.

name: Battle Grid

name: NextToDo
